title: Microsoft wants you to stick with Windows 10's default apps
text:
Microsoft wants you to stick with Windows 10's default apps 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
If you don't like how difficult it is to change your default web browser in Windows 10... well, you may be particularly upset in the near fu... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
